title: Cloud font
content:
Does anybody know any puffy font in the shape of clouds?  
Thanks!
author: ill sans

comments.content:
Hooi Tom,

here you go: [McKloud](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103164158/http:/www.dafont.com/mckloud.font) by Jessica Slater/Apostrophic Labs, the all-weather cloud font.  
F

There's Dust up over at You Work for Them.

[http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0054](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103164158/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0054 "http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0054")
